pages.text: A device which can mine out a large area. A Power Cell must be placed in the Laser Quarry before activation. When powered with redstone, the quarry will begin breaking blocks radially outwards from the column underneath it. The quarry voids blocks, but does not break ores and certain other blocks in #rankine:nonquarryable, such as spawners and bedrock.

The Quarry Barrier can be place anywhere in the region of the Laser Quarry and no blocks will be broken beneath it. This can be used to protect anything below a certain y-level, or to define a non-square wall pattern.

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: The minimum construction shown by the previous page will only result in a 3x3 hole. In order to increase the range, Laser Pylon Bases can be stacked in the location of the pylon tops shown in the multiblock. They will have to be topped with Laser Pylon Tops and each layer of height equals one extra blockm in radius. The maximum range/height can be set in the config.
